_sText: I decided to brought this map version 2 with jail because I saw that some servers were playing on old version with jail. So here it is. This map is very fun to play with high amount of players and it is really good on rpg too.

This is new version of surf_skate_pro.

In this version i moved usp's to other place and replaced them with knifes. I created some more stuff and areas. 
I added thing that you will be teleported back to spawn if you drop to ground in 15secs at first part so noobs wont die so quick. I improved last part little bit and i also fixed some bugs... So i think thats all. 

I hope you like this map and you will comment & asses this map.

The new version of my skate map.

fixed spawn shootin(u now start every round with knives)
added more spawns

not realy a final version but a good test.
suggestions are still welcome.

This is a map I made from scratch but is based off of the original surf_skate_park. You must surf the three levels and if you fall on any of them you will get teleported to a half pipe jail where you fight with shotguns. If you get to the end of the map you have a choice between the ct and t spawns, or the jail. If you choose one of the spawns you will be teleported there to hunt people down with a shotgun. If you choose the jail option everybody's weapons in jail will be stripped and everyone's health, including the winners will be set to one. The winner will fight in jail with a shotgun and meanwhile, a glass wall will break revealing a rack of scouts for the other prisoners to fight with, but remember everyone only has one health! Have some fun and I hope to see this map on some servers!

Small change 2 usual surfing on skate ramps instead.

screenshots arnt working.
Sry i called it surf_skate_park but people will understand it more.

This map was created to honor Kiiru's & RambJoe's original map surf_sinister and hopefully we have created something even they could be proud of, also note that this map is as hard if not even harder than the original map so you might have a tough time before you beat it.
hope all of you enjoy!

(Also idk why but the screenshots are low-resolution.)

Thx alot to Juxtapo for making a video of the map and ofcourse Beetle for the surfdemos!

surf_sinister
=============
This map is created by Rambjoe but design, spawn and end are created by me.
I don't know where Rambjoe is and he hasn't been online for over 100 days now. 

Therefore I'll release this map because he wanted it to be released ASAP. Let's hope you aren't dead Joe...

Also: to enter bonus you have to enter the gate at stage 3, otherwise you aren't allowed. (a trigger)

This map is also unbelieveable hard t6 map, so bring on your skills and show what you got.

My first map ever finished... Surf_singletons made for -tickrate 66 5 Levels, 1 Jail and 3mins 30secs to complete it, yes its an easy map. Jail will give everyone a knife and if someone completes it he/she will get a m4, deagle and a nade... he/she dosent need a knife :P Bonus and any other jails wil come in a later version This video is me surfing it (the nooby way) when it has no lighting no timer and 1 bot(to test jail). its the exact same map you will play nothing changed apart from a timer added and compiled so the lighting will show.

Just a surf map i put together in my spare time. This is my first surf map, though it is not my first CSS map. Compared to many other surf maps, it is quite small, but I managed to fit a few areas as well as a jail in this map. I would like to thank the FPSBanana community for writing the tutorials that helped me with the creation of this map, a small sampling of which were tutorials about creating weapon dispensers, stripping weapons, and making ramps the right size and angle. Thank you all for helping me with this map.

My first map for CSS surfing. Includes a jail with lasers, falling boxes and water that floods and drowns anyone in the jail.

Any requests or problems please say.

Jailed inspired by rebel_resistance. All credit of the jail idea goes to the makers of rebel resistance.

Two buttons at end, one opens up door, other opens up the floor and they fall to thier death.

Right now you can just touch the door to open it from the prison. I did this becuase its really just a beta and that way people can surf it a lil more. THe final won't be like this

My first CS map. Decided to make it a surf map being they are easy to make and don't require too much attention to detail.

The map is somehwat difficult for new surfers. Its fairly short. Includes a prison area with opening door.

Ok... right this is the 3rd and final time i am editing this map exept for when i do another version of it... it is a small but sweet map with lots of exciting secrets. i have basically just edited the ramps to make them smoother and either put in some more secrets or made them better. i hope you enjoy playing on my map and it does get alot better when u firgure out where and what each 5 secrets do :P

NORMAL VERSION FOUND AT: http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/160726
<hr>

This has been in development for quite a while, and has gone through a number of beta iterations. It takes great (gameplay) influence from the rebel resist series.
<hr>

The map is NOT HARD. Unlike most recent linear maps, it focuses on jail combat, as well as the odd m3 surfing fights. There are weapon pickups throughout the entire map. The surf, un-boosted, with no shortcuts takes about 1:30 from start to finish. There is no teleport that takes everyone to jail in this version. However, there are a number of places to tele-boost from, and many, many shortcuts, so those that thrive on forever shaving times off their runs will have a field day here.
<hr>

Secrets are a'plenty in here too. Some are very simple, and easy to get to, but others are much more extravagant, with higher payoffs. However, very, very few are easy to find. Let's hope you enjoy what you find.
<hr>

**FOR ALL THE TIMER SERVER OWNERS:** 

I am willing to cull large portions of this map, and clean it up so that it will play nicely with your servers. If you want this, please contact me directly. Else, don't go messing with my map, and don't change the name without permission.
<hr>

Skybox textures are by komaokc.

Many, many thanks to all the beta testers, and all the surfers on the surf-infamous server who gladly played and gave feedback over the past few months.

A special shout out to Extol, Spliff and the rest of the Australian (and kiwi) surfers who provided feedback on this.

And finally, thanks to Fission, who is always willing to help with improving these maps. And, of course, the video he made.
<hr>

**Alternative Downloads:**

Or the .zip here: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18017339/surf_shweet_dm.zip
<hr>

Video:
<iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/04aLuL27qgE" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

I needed a change of pace after mapping things for surf_knights, so I went for a freeform surf including my favorite weapon, the M3.  Enjoy!


There is a bombsite, and I'll be interested to see how it affects gameplay with a full server.


Yes, the flashlight level exists.  Good luck surfing it if you didn't get there quickly enough to buy nightvision.

surf style map

OKAY: I KNOW EVERYONE HATES SOMEONE THAT REMAKES MAPS, BUT GIVE THIS MAP A TRY.  Here's the story.  I was playing on surf_shivvers on Dynamics server and I realised it was fun if you thought of it as a freestyle map, so I made a few slight modifications.  Feedback welcomed with open arms.

Ok guys, here we have a surf map of epic proportions, it rivals in size 
surf_leet_turbo if you know it. Not just long, but HUGE surfing sections, sometimes it splits into 2 ways, one easy and one difficult way.

Updates will come out when I get feedback from the community! feel free to distribute or host anywhere. Please no modifications!
surf_shit by Paul

My reason for making this instead of another linear was simply because there has been a serious lack of combat maps lately. In any server I join running combat, it's always the same 10 maps being run over and over. It felt to me like there needed to be a change, so I started this project. 

This map features:
-More guns than you could possible want
-Two bomb zones
-Incredibly smooth tele-boosts
-A secrets lobby room
-Various secrets around the main surf
-Beautiful textures by Skyppy, Maxfx, and PhilipK

It is my hope that combat surfing makes a full recovery. I've seen a large influx of such servers with consistent populations lately, so I'm doing my part to keep them alive.

Hope to see you in game!

Copyright 2012 scaz.zaf. This item is not authorized for posting on Steam, except under the Steam account named scaz.zaf

This is surf_sharks by Dan.  I made this map.  It is a small arena like map.
You hold down your jump button (preferably space bar) to skim across the water at high speeds and knife them to death.  There are 4 shotguns with unlimited ammo in the corners (only guns accurate while water scimming).  If you are afk you fall into the water after 20 seconds and drown.  After 2 minutes have passed, if you havent yet died you will get hurt with 2 damage every 1/2 second.  If lose speed just go on bottom to teleport back to your spawn.  Boosters on the sides.

enjoy
- Dan

They are 4 stages in this map and 3 possiblity jail !

This map is my pride and joy. I spent countless hours working on it, and for the first time I am proud to release something. I spent a lot of time in making exciting jails as well as the surf.

The timer is set at 5 minutes. If you fail to beat the map in the given amount of time, the map randomly chooses from three combat jails

- Deagle arena

- Highspeed knife arena

- Awp arena with breaking glass platforms

----
The "win jail" is a jail with two alternatives. Either you can press the blue button for a m249, deagle and knife. Or you can press the red button and blocks will start falling randomly from the roof, smashing everyone.

Jail explanation.
In the win room, you enter the pyramid. There you will find 4 sprites.

Blue sprite - Knife arena
Red sprite - Deagle arena
Pink sprite - Awp arena
Green sprite - Punishment jail. (See: "win jail" above)
----
I'd like to thank Ryan Sterner for being helpful. I would also thank cloud and Esel for testing my map a lot.
....

I hope you have a lot of fun playing this map, and I would be very happy if you gave me a rating.

- razEr

Surf_Sentou
A Simple Surf Combat Map
----------------------------
A map I made that took less then 2 hours. Its a simple combat surf map, 4 weapons, M3, m4a1, ak47 and scout, you start with a deagle and a knife.

The map is quite big but has a simple layout and concept, simple textures and a skybox with HDR.

64 Spawns, 32 CTs and Ts.

surf_sempar_njv

This is a skill surf map created by pArA 8D and Seme.

It has six stages and a bonus aimed at being about tier 3-4.

The map is an _njv (no jail version) as it is designed for surf timer servers.

A version with a jail for combat skill surf servers may be released in the future depending on feedback.

Hope you enjoy the map and please leave (constructive) comments xD

-----------------------------

reacz - portal 2 texture pack on stage 6

Icecreamlock - glass textures stage 5

Wolves Assault Hero - neon texture stage 3

surf_selection
About Map
This is small map with 8 stages, you can choose map if you jump into the hole first. If nobody jump into the hole, map will automatic choose random map. You have 45 seconds to jump into the hole, after jump into the hole you have 15 to choose map.
